comments: i think this intro course is pretty interesting to me. i major in cp. and i find this course very helpful. grading is pretty fair. you have severl assignment to do which helps spread out the workload. i would recommend this class to my friends.

Legates has a monotone voice, and succeeds in making the subject exceedingly boring. He asks way too much from students who are most likely taking CP110 as an intro course. Demands for the midterm include being able to cite specific sources from the 30 different readings that we were supposed to do.
he\'s tough. but he knows his stuff.
